sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSACCLIST where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and ORDNU = :ordnu and BRC = :brc

insert into LNSACCLIST (ACCTNO, ACCTSTAT, ORDNU, BRC, TRANDATE, BILLTRANDATE, BILLSERSEQNO, BILLTXNSEQ, INACCTNO, SUBCTRLCODE, ACCTYPE, CCY, CDFLAG, TRANAMT, BAL, DAYS, ACCUM, VOUKIND, PRECHARCODE, VOUCHERNO, MEMOCODE, MEMONAME, OPPACCTNO, CANACCTNO, MODIFYTIME, SERSEQNO, TXNSEQ, TRANCODE, SUBTRANCODE, TRANBRC, TELLERCODE, AUTHCODE, CHECKCODE, PGNM, PRINTFLAG, TRANSOURCE, RECORDTYPE, FLAG1, FLAG2, FLAG3, SEQ, SEQ1) values (:acctno, :acctstat, :ordnu, :brc, :trandate, :billtrandate, :billserseqno, :billtxnseq, :inacctno, :subctrlcode, :acctype, :ccy, :cdflag, :tranamt, :bal, :days, :accum, :voukind, :precharcode, :voucherno, :memocode, :memoname, :oppacctno, :canacctno, current timestamp, :serseqno, :txnseq, :trancode, :subtrancode, :tranbrc, :tellercode, :authcode, :checkcode, :pgnm, :printflag, :transource, :recordtype, :flag1, :flag2, :flag3, :seq, :seq1)

update LNSACCLIST set TRANDATE = :trandate, BILLTRANDATE = :billtrandate, BILLSERSEQNO = :billserseqno, BILLTXNSEQ = :billtxnseq, INACCTNO = :inacctno, SUBCTRLCODE = :subctrlcode, ACCTYPE = :acctype, CCY = :ccy, CDFLAG = :cdflag, TRANAMT = :tranamt, BAL = :bal, DAYS = :days, ACCUM = :accum, VOUKIND = :voukind, PRECHARCODE = :precharcode, VOUCHERNO = :voucherno, MEMOCODE = :memocode, MEMONAME = :memoname, OPPACCTNO = :oppacctno, CANACCTNO = :canacctno, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp, SERSEQNO = :serseqno, TXNSEQ = :txnseq, TRANCODE = :trancode, SUBTRANCODE = :subtrancode, TRANBRC = :tranbrc, TELLERCODE = :tellercode, AUTHCODE = :authcode, CHECKCODE = :checkcode, PGNM = :pgnm, PRINTFLAG = :printflag, TRANSOURCE = :transource, RECORDTYPE = :recordtype, FLAG1 = :flag1, FLAG2 = :flag2, FLAG3 = :flag3, SEQ = :seq, SEQ1 = :seq1 where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and ORDNU = :ordnu and BRC = :brc

select ACCTNO, ACCTSTAT, ORDNU, BRC, TRANDATE, BILLTRANDATE, BILLSERSEQNO, BILLTXNSEQ, INACCTNO, SUBCTRLCODE, ACCTYPE, CCY, CDFLAG, TRANAMT, BAL, DAYS, ACCUM, VOUKIND, PRECHARCODE, VOUCHERNO, MEMOCODE, MEMONAME, OPPACCTNO, CANACCTNO, MODIFYTIME, SERSEQNO, TXNSEQ, TRANCODE, SUBTRANCODE, TRANBRC, TELLERCODE, AUTHCODE, CHECKCODE, PGNM, PRINTFLAG, TRANSOURCE, RECORDTYPE, FLAG1, FLAG2, FLAG3, SEQ, SEQ1 from LNSACCLIST where ACCTNO = :acctno and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and ORDNU = :ordnu and BRC = :brc
